title: 61: OBITCH it was all yellow...
description:
Well hello Geoffs! This week Madison shares the horrifying history behind the Canary Girls, and then Spencer cools things off by telling us all about a little annual events known as Frozen Dead Guy Days! We’ve got an obituary for an icon, one that rhymes, and one that’s straight to the point. OH how could we forget, we’ve also got some dumb.ass.criminallllllls! 


New episodes come out every Thursday for free, with 1-week early access for Wondery+ subscribers.


Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 


Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com


Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes

PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807


Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast



Sources:

https://historyofyesterday.com/the-canary-girls-who-worked-to-death-during-ww1-8daaac29bc

https://blog.nationalarchives.gov.uk/causes-prevention-tri-nitro-toluene-tnt-poisoning/

https://thecowkeeperswish.com/tag/tnt-poisoning

https://museum.wales/articles/2053/Canary-Girls-/

https://www.canary-girls.com/about

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frozen_Dead_Guy_Days

https://sofrep.com/news/the-canary-girls-of-world-war-one/

https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-england-39434504

https://www.warhistoryonline.com/featured/canary-girls-women-muntion-workers-in-wwi-turned-yellow-and-gave-birth-to-yellow-babies.html?safari=1

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2561630/The-war-children-born-YELLOW-How-women-working-explosives-factories-sparked-clutch-Canary-Babies-WW1.html

https://www.thevintagenews.com/2016/04/18/the-canary-girls-story-of-the-munitionettes-and-how-the-poisons-of-wwi-turned-them-yellow-2/?safari=1

https://blog.nationalarchives.gov.uk/causes-prevention-tri-nitro-toluene-tnt-poisoning/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_munition_workers_who_died_of_TNT_poisoning#CITEREFWeinerThomson1947

https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/phoenix-az/randy-ferguson-5114236

https://www.dailyrepublic.com/all-dr-news/wires/state-nation-world/florida-woman-with-plastic-gun-robs-mail-carrier-rides-off-on-tricycle-cops-say/

https://frozendeadguydays.com
